timeline.bodyText:
Optional:
The Inspect button affords users "a peek behind the curtain", so they may better understand the data being surfaced by histograms on the overview, and throughout the app.
That said, users who may be less familiar with the Elasticsearch query DSL shown by the Inspect button don't need to understand the queries right away in order to become productive with the SIEM app.
Consider placing the new All histograms and graphs... paragraph in a callout that indicates this is a "tip", as opposed to a requirement for effectively using the app.
